Bindings.Binding: if EngraverFrame and EngraverOptions then local options = EngraverOptions.UseCharacterSpecificSettings and EngraverOptions or EngraverSharedOptions if options.VisibilityMode == "ToggleKeybind" then if keystate == "down" then EngraverFrame:SetShown(not EngraverFrame:IsShown()) end elseif options.VisibilityMode == "HoldKeybind" then if keystate == "down" then EngraverFrame:Show() else EngraverFrame:Hide() end end end
